Public Member Functions

String[] getDocument (InputStream IS)
String toString ()

Detailed Description

Scraper that is able to get the title and text from web pages of the ANSA's web site (www.ansa.it) that contain single news.

Author:
Salvo Danilo Giuffrida (salvod.giuffrida@gmail.com)

Definition at line 14 of file ANSAScraper.java.

Member Function Documentation

String [] documentclassifier.Scrapers.ANSAScraper.getDocument ( InputStream  IS  ) 

Method that takes in input an InputStream, reads a document from it, and returns an array of strings, with its title (position 0) and text (position 1).

Parameters:
IS The InputStream from where reading a document.
Returns:
An array of two strings, containing respectively the document's title and text.

Implements documentclassifier.Scrapers.Scraper.

String documentclassifier.Scrapers.ANSAScraper.toString (  ) 

Method that returns a short description of this scraper (not longer than one row), like for example the name of the web site it refers to (ANSA.it, CNN.com, etc...), or the type of file it is able to scrape (HTML, PDF, Word, ODT, etc...).

Returns:
A short description of this scraper.

Implements documentclassifier.Scrapers.Scraper.
